attributes.action: Implement the use of hemp over non-recyclable materials
attributes.additional_details: We want change so we can live in brighter world where people can breathe fresh air and not feel guilty because of how our comfort is obtained. We want change so there is a world for us to leave to our children. We want change because we don’t want to be the wretched race that destroyed so much beauty because we couldn’t get our heads out of our arses. We want change and to calm the aggression this gluttonous way of life causes. We want respect for our mother Earth.
attributes.background: We want hemp to replace any unnecessary materials that cause any harm to our planet or us. Hemp can be used as plastic, cement, food and even for fertiliser. The use of toxic materials such as plastic is completely unnecessary and is against the will of the public.

rejection.details:
Decisions on what products are used are a matter for manufacturers. You could sign this petition on banning single-use plastic, if that's what you'd like to see happen:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300152
